bioghist.p: In 1950, the Department of Physical Medicine was established by its first chairman, James W. Rae. It was among the first of its kind in the country, and helped provide needed research-based programs for people with disabilities. Theodore M. Cole was appointed to the chair in 1977. James A. Leonard is the current chairman.

scopecontent.p: The Department of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation Publications are divided into two series: Unit Publications and Sub-Unit Publications.
The Unit Publications series contains the department's Annual Report from 1988/89 and 1990/91 as well as a brochure listing the programs offered by the department.
The Sub-Unit Publications series contains an undated (1960's or 70's) brochure for the Parkview Rehabilitation Unit.
